decks.notes: This deck is focused on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and using spells to deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early on and finish them off with burst damage from cards like Burst Lightning and Torch the Tower. The deck also runs card draw and selection spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to ensure a consistent flow of threats and answers. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient aggression.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively overwhelm your opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and powerful spells. By utilizing cards like Abhorrent Oculus, Marauding Mako, and Torch the Tower, you can apply constant pressure and chip away at your opponent's life total. With a mix of creature aggression and spell disruption, you can control the board and ensure your opponent has limited options to defend against your attacks. Additionally, cards like Profit's Eidetic Memory and Winternight Stories provide card advantage and flexibility in your strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells, creating a strong and consistent offensive strategy. The deck aims to apply constant pressure with creatures like Archfiend of the Dross and Qarsi Revenant, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with Duress and Go for the Throat. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber and Soulstone Sanctuary allows for additional value generation and card advantage. The goal is to control the board and drain the opponent's resources while pushing for a swift victory.

The focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively play creatures and spells to deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards that pump up creatures and provide additional damage, such as Monastery Swiftspear and Burst Lightning, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with constant pressure. With a mix of low-cost creatures and efficient spells, this deck aims to control the board and finish off the opponent swiftly before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells and creature manipulation cards. By using cards like Temporary Lockdown, Leyline Binding, and Ride's End, the deck aims to hinder the opponent's board development and limit their options. Additionally, cards like Overlord of the Hauntwoods, Zur Eternal Schemer, and Overlord of the Mistmoors provide powerful creatures to dominate the battlefield. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors while also providing utility lands like Cavern of Souls and Floodfarm Verge.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and instant spells, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By utilizing a combination of powerful creatures like Marauding Mako and Steamcore Scholar, along with spells like Torch the Tower and Spell Pierce, this deck aims to control the tempo of the game and put pressure on the opponent. With cards like Fear of Missing Out and Tersa Lightshatter providing additional support, the Jeskai Aggro deck aims to win the game swiftly before the opponent can build up their own board.

The main idea behind this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, backed up by cheap, efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage. The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage and maintaining card advantage through cards like Opt and Stormchaser's Talent. Riverpyre Verge provides mana fixing while Sleight of Hand and Stock Up help dig for crucial cards. The deck aims to finish off the opponent quickly before they have a chance to stabilize.

This UR aggro deck focuses on playing low cost, aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage provide additional burn spells to help finish off the opponent. Opt and Sleight of Hand allow for card selection and digging for key cards. Stock Up and Stormchaser's Talent provide buffs to our creatures, making them even more threatening. The mana base is designed to consistently cast our spells and keep the pressure on the opponent.

The main idea of this Jeskai Control deck is to slow down and control the game by utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Dispelling Exhale, Temporary Lockdown, and Get Lost while also stabilizing with powerful cards like Lightning Helix and Day of Judgment. By managing the board with control spells and generating card advantage with draw spells like Meticulous Archive, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win through gradual advantage.

The main concept of this Jeskai Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing powerful creatures like Marauding Mako and Steamcore Scholar, while also utilizing burn spells such as Torch the Tower and Glacial Dragonhunt, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and often. Additionally, the inclusion of card draw and protection spells like Profet's Eidetic Memory and Sheltered by Ghosts helps to maintain aggression and board presence throughout the game. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to all three colors of mana needed for the deck.

The main concept of this deck is to achieve a game-winning combo using Omniscience and Roiling Dragonstorm. By playing key spells like Moment of Truth and Stock Up, the player can gain card advantage and control the board with cards like Temporary Lockdown. Marang River Regent and other creatures can provide additional threats while cards like Spell Pierce and Ephara's Dispersal help to protect the combo. The deck aims to dominate the game by casting powerful spells for free and overwhelming the opponent with dragons and other powerful creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disrupt their game plan with control elements. By utilizing a mix of cheap creatures like Nurturing Pixie and Preacher of the Schism along with removal spells like Nowhere to Run and Hopeless Nightmare, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while also controlling the board. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Beza, the Bounding Spring provides additional threats that can quickly end the game if left unanswered. Additionally, the deck features various lands that provide utility and mana fixing to ensure smooth gameplay.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells in order to quickly reduce their life total to zero. With a low mana curve and efficient creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Hired Claw, combined with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Monstrous Rage and Witchstalker Frenzy provide additional ways to enhance the damage output of the creatures and close out the game swiftly.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and quick burn spells to deal direct damage. By consistently applying pressure on the opponent, this Red Deck Wins archetype aims to secure a fast victory before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. Cards like Burst Lightning, Monstrous Rage, and Emberheart Challenger help to maintain a swift tempo, while creatures like Manifold Mouse and Hired Claw provide additional threats. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and proactive, prioritizing an all-out assault on the opponent's life total.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, along with removal spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to deal damage to the opponent. Opt and Sleight of Hand help to dig for more threats or answers, while Stock Up provides additional buffs to the creatures. Stormchaser's Talent enhances the creatures' abilities, making them more threatening. The mana base prioritizes blue and red sources to ensure consistent casting of spells. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient threats.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear, Drake Hatcher, and Cori-Steel Cutter to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage provide removal and pump spells to boost the power of the creatures. Opt, Sleight of Hand, and Stock Up help to draw cards and find key pieces while Stormchaser's Talent provides additional damage. The mana base is designed to support the blue and red spells with lands like Shivan Reef and Spirebluff Canal. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a steady stream of threats to overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this Aggro Abzan deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruption spells. By using cards like Skirmish Rhino and Sunpearl Kirin to apply pressure early on, paired with removal spells like Maelstrom Pulse and Nowhere to Run to control the battlefield, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Severance Priest and Spiteful Hexmage also allows for additional ways to disrupt the opponent's strategy, making it difficult for them to recover and mount a defense.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures and use burn spells to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck aims to curve out efficiently with a mix of low cost creatures and powerful spells, while also including some card draw and counter magic to maintain card advantage and protect its threats. The mana base is optimized for consistent access to multiple colors of mana, allowing the deck to cast its spells effectively. Overall, the deck seeks to be proactive and apply pressure on the opponent to quickly secure a victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. By applying pressure early with cards like Abhorrent Oculus and Marauding Mako, and backing them up with direct damage spells like Torch the Tower and Glacial Dragonhunt, the goal is to take control of the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. Tersa Lightshatter and Spyglass Siren provide additional disruption, while the card draw and memory manipulation effects of cards like Profet's Eidetic Memory keep the aggression going. The deck also includes some control elements like Spell Pierce and Abrade to handle threats from the opponent.

This deck focuses on assembling the pieces needed to create a powerful combo involving Omniscience. By combining cards like Marang River Regent, Roiling Dragonstorm, and Moment of Truth, the player can create a devastating board state that can overwhelm the opponent. With cards like Abuelo's Awakening and Stock Up to find key pieces, the deck aims to quickly set up the combo and establish a lock on the game. Using counterspells like Spell Pierce to protect the combo, the deck aims to quickly win the game once Omniscience hits the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and pump spells, dealing fast and consistent damage. By utilizing low-cost creatures with abilities like haste and trample, combined with burn spells and combat tricks, the goal is to apply relentless pressure on the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The mana base is streamlined to maximize efficiency and ensure a consistent flow of spells to keep the pressure on throughout the game.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, using low-cost creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly. The deck focuses on dealing damage early and often, utilizing creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Heartfire Hero along with spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to pressure the opponent. Additionally, the mana base includes mostly Mountains to ensure consistent access to red mana for the deck's spells and abilities.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures with powerful abilities and using burn spells to deal damage to the opponent quickly. With a low mana curve and a focus on dealing damage as quickly as possible, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike allow for reach in case the opponent is able to stabilize, while cards like Manifold Mouse and Monstrous Rage help to add extra damage to the board. Overall, the goal is to win the game as fast as possible through aggressive creature attacks and burn spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures and burn spells in order to deal damage as efficiently as possible. By utilizing low-cost creatures with high power and burn spells, this deck aims to apply pressure early in the game and maintain control until the opponent is defeated. The inclusion of cards like Burst Lightning, Monstrous Rage, and Lightning Strike further supports this aggressive playstyle, while the mana base is optimized for consistent red mana production.

This deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently to take down opponents as fast as possible. It includes a mix of direct damage spells, creatures with abilities that boost their power, and creatures that can attack swiftly. The mana base is designed to have plenty of red sources for casting spells and creatures efficiently. The creatures in the deck have low mana costs, allowing for aggressive plays early in the game. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a consistent stream of damage.

The focus of this deck is to quickly play low-cost creatures and spells in order to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. Cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Slickshot Show-Off allow for early aggression, while Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage provide additional direct damage. The deck also includes card draw spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to maintain a constant stream of threats. With a mix of creatures and burn spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to set up their own game plan.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures such as Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, while utilizing burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to deal direct damage to the opponent. It also includes card draw and manipulation spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to maintain card advantage and find the needed pieces. The goal is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures and burn spells, while also having some counter spells like Spell Pierce for protection.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast paced aggression. By utilizing low cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, along with cards like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage for additional damage, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. Drake Hatcher and Thundertrap Trainer provide additional threats, while cards like Opt and Sleight of Hand help with card selection. The deck also features a mix of land cards to ensure smooth mana curve and consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter alongside burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes card draw and utility spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand to ensure consistency. With a mana base that supports both Blue and Red spells, this deck is able to apply constant pressure and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game.

This deck focuses on quickly pressuring the opponent with low-cost creatures and direct damage spells. By playing aggressively and efficiently utilizing instants and sorceries, the goal is to maintain a steady stream of damage while keeping the opponent on the defensive. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to both red and blue mana sources, allowing for flexibility in casting spells. Ultimately, the strategy revolves around maintaining board presence and applying constant pressure to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly play low-cost aggressive creatures and use a combination of burn spells and pump effects to deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient offensive strategy, utilizing cards that can quickly generate advantage and pressure the opponent. By efficiently using resources and maximizing damage output, the deck aims to close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize or mount a defense.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of powerful creatures like Overlord of the Hauntwoods and Overlord of the Mistmoors, along with spell cards like Ride's End and Leyline Binding. Use cards like Get Lost and Temporary Lockdown to disrupt your opponent's strategy while building up your own board presence with cards like Zur, Eternal Schemer and Beza, the Bounding Spring. Utilize your lands like Hushwood Verge and Lush Portico to generate mana efficiently and maintain control of the game until you can secure victory.
